逰字的基本解释

逰
yóu
古同“遊”。

逰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yóu］
［《廣韻》以周切，平尤，以。］
亦作“逰1”。
(1)游览；云游。
(2)游乐；游荡。
(3)古代帝王春天巡行。
(4)冶游。
(5)游观的处所。
(6)交游；结交。
(7)结交的朋友。
(8)求学。
(9)指求仕，求职。
(10)游说。
(11)行走。
(12)无官职者；无职业者。
(13)放纵，放任；无拘束。
(14)潜水浮行；游泳。
(15)行动；实施。
(16)虚浮不实。参见“遊言”。
(17)飘流。
(18)运转；运行。
(19)通“由”。

逰字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【辵字部】　逰； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1259第20
俗遊字。

逰字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
逰字的起名意思

暂无。

Tie
Basic explanation of words
Tie
yóu
Gu Tong "you".
Tie
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yóu］
["Guangyun" cuts with Zhou, Pingyou, with. ]
Also known as "Tai 1".
(1) Tour; travel around.
(2) Pleasure; wandering.
(3) The ancient emperors traveled in spring.
(4) Yeyou.
(5) Youguan's premises.
(6) Make friends; make friends.
(7) The friends you make.
(8) Go to school.
(9) Refers to job seeking, job hunting.
(10) Lobbying.
(11) Walking.
(12) Those without official positions; those without occupations.
(13) Indulgence, laissez-faire; unrestrained.
(14) Diving and floating; swimming.
(15) Action; implementation.
(16) Floating and untrue. See "traveling".
(17) Drifting.
(18) Running; running.
(19) Through "you".
